sqlQuery.sql: SELECT hour as timestamp, formatDateTime(hour, '%Y-%m-%d') as block_date, '9889' as chain_id, distinct_id as user_address, assetId as token_address, symbol as token_symbol, balance as token_amount FROM (SELECT date_trunc('hour', timestamp) as hour, distinct_id, symbol, assetId, SUM(SUM(CAST(COALESCE(NULLIF(decimalAmount, ''), '0') as DECIMAL(21,9))))  OVER (PARTITION BY distinct_id, symbol, assetId ORDER BY date_trunc('hour', timestamp)) as balance FROM assetBalance WHERE decimalAmount <> '' GROUP BY hour, distinct_id, symbol, assetId) ORDER BY user_address, token_address, timestamp;
